name: Lukas Taegert
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: Professionally I have been working on frontend applications both with React and AngularJS for three years. Privately I do a lot of open source work and since the end of last year I am acting co-maintainer of Rollup.js.
what_can_i_contribute: Hands on sessions about Rollup.js, e.g. about the new runtime-free code-splitting features. A look behind the scenes if anyone is interested.
